org.eclipse.keyple.distributed

Interface ObservableRemoteReaderServer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.event.ObservableReader, org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.Reader, RemoteReaderServer

    public interface ObservableRemoteReaderServer
extends RemoteReaderServer, org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.event.ObservableReader
    API of the Observable Remote Reader Server provided by the Remote Plugin Server.

    This reader behaves like an ObservableReader but exposes additional services inherited from RemoteReaderServer.

    Since:
    1.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.event.ObservableReader

      • Methods inherited from interface org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.event.ObservableReader

      • Methods inherited from interface org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.Reader
